text: aap farmaiye ke Allah taâ€™ala ke paida kiye hoye asbaabe zeenath ko, jin ko us ne apne bandho ke waaste banaaya hai aur khaane pine ki halaal chizo ko, kis shaqs ne haraam kiya hai? aap keh di jiye ke ye ashya is taur par ke qayaamath ke roz qaalis hogi ahle imaan ke liye, dunyaawi zindagi mein momino ke liye bhi hai, hum isi tarah tamaam ayaath ko samajh-daaro ke waaste saaf saaf bayaan karte hai
